metaDescription: Gong Revenue AI OS helps your entire GTM organization win. Drive growth with multimodal revenue signal processing, specialized AI agents, and purpose-built applications.
headlines: The #1 AI operating system for Revenue Teams
Gong is a Leader in the 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Revenue Action Orchestration
Winning GTM organizations run revenue on Gong
Pitchbook is 10x more efficient with revenue AI
The world’s richest revenue graph, a team of specialized AI agents , and apps your team loves   to use. All designed to help your revenue team win.
aboutSummary: Gong is a Leader in the 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Revenue Action Orchestration
valueProps: Gong is a Leader in the 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Revenue Action Orchestration
Built to help your revenue team crush goals, close with confidence, and keep growing — ring the gong, deal after deal, quarter after quarter.
Gong placed highest among the 12 vendors evaluated in Ability to Execute, as well as furthest in Completeness of Vision.
Kick busywork to the curb and help your entire GTM team focus on what matters — winning.
"Gong insights help us learn, train our reps, and — most importantly — provide a better service to our customers and prospects.
